name: Catastrophe - Pre Demo
description:
This is a survival horror game currently under development/ prototype stage, which is made in 1 week for Brackeys' official 8th game jam. Here is the prototype version. Enjoy playing and comment down below your suggestions!!!

Music - Eerie Tone by TheDweebMan

Sounds:- Gunshot -> Silenced pistol shot by Clutvh

Materials for evil cube - Meat Monster By HighGK

So happy to receive donations as they are directly contributed to the complete development of game :)
